A fiend with dark powers for confusing the enemy. Among the Fiend-Type monsters, this monster boasts considerable force.

(This card is always treated as an "Archfiend" card.)
4094.name: Summoned Skull

9278.effect: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Contract with the Abyss". This card's name becomes "Summoned Skull" on the field, but is still treated as an "Archfiend" card. Cannot be destroyed by battle, except by battle with a Ritual Monster, and cannot be destroyed by monster effects, except those of Ritual Monsters. If this Ritual Summoned card you control is sent to your GY by an opponent's card: You can Special Summon 1 "Summoned Skull" from your hand, Deck, or GY.
9278.name: Archfiend's Awakening

9451.effect:
"Summoned Skull" + 1 DARK monster
This card's name becomes "Summoned Skull" on the field, but is still treated as an "Archfiend" card. All "Summoned Skull" you control gain 500 ATK. If this Fusion Summoned card you control is sent to your GY by an opponent's card: You can Special Summon 1 "Summoned Skull" from your hand, Deck, or GY.
9451.name: Archfiend's Manifestation

9618.effect:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
This card's name becomes "Summoned Skull" on the field, but is still treated as an "Archfiend" card. Your opponent cannot target any "Summoned Skull" you control with card effects. If this Synchro Summoned card you control is sent to your GY by an opponent's card: You can Special Summon 1 "Summoned Skull" from your hand, Deck, or GY.
9618.name: Archfiend's Call

9785.effect:
2 Level 6 monsters
This card's name becomes "Summoned Skull" on the field, but is still treated as an "Archfiend" card. If "Summoned Skull(s)" you control would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can detach 1 material from this card instead. If this Xyz Summoned card you control is sent to your GY by an opponent's card: You can Special Summon 1 "Summoned Skull" from your hand, Deck, or GY.
9785.name: Archfiend's Ascent

1916785.effect: You can reveal 1 Level 4 Ritual Monster in your hand; Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Dragon Paladin Unity" from your Deck or GY to your hand, also for the rest of this turn, you cannot Special Summon monsters, except Ritual Monsters, until you Special Summon a Ritual Monster. You can only use each effect of "Dragon Paladin Rugal" once per turn.
1916785.name: Dragon Paladin Rugal

1914724.effect: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Heterochromatic Dragon Ritual". At the start of the Damage Step, if this card attacks a monster: You can destroy 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls. You can Tribute this card; Special Summon 1 Level 7 or higher "Odd-Eyes" monster from your hand or face-up Extra Deck. You can only use each effect of "Paladin of Heterochromatic Dragon" once per turn.
1914724.name: Paladin of Heterochromatic Dragon

1916579.effect: When this card is activated: You can add 1 "Dragon Paladin" monster, or "Dragon Ritual" Ritual Spell from your Deck to your hand, except "Dragon Paladin Unity". Level 4 "Paladin" Ritual Monsters you control gain 700 ATK. Once per turn: You can reveal 1 "Dragon Ritual" Spell in your hand; this turn, if you would activate that card's effect that Ritual Summons a Ritual Monster, you can Ritual Summon that monster from your Deck.
1916579.name: Dragon Paladin Unity

1916745.effect: This card is used to Ritual Summon "Paladin of Heterochromatic Dragon". You must also Tribute monsters from your hand or field whose total Levels exactly equal 4. During your Main Phase, except the turn this card was sent to the GY: You can banish monsters from your face-up field or GY whose total Levels equal 4 or more; banish this card from your GY, and if you do, Special Summon 1 Level 4 "Paladin" Ritual Monster from your hand or GY (This is treated as a Ritual Summon).
1916745.name: Heterochromatic Dragon Ritual

1916575.effect: This card is used to Ritual Summon "Paladin of Storm Dragon". You must also Tribute monsters from your hand or field whose total Levels exactly equal 4. If this card is in your GY, except the turn it was sent there: You can banish this card, then shuffle 1 Level 4 "Paladin" Ritual Monster in your hand or on your field into your Deck; Special Summon 1 Level 4 "Paladin" Ritual Monster from your Deck with a different name than the shuffled monster. (This is treated as a Ritual Summon). You can only use this effect of "Storm Dragon Ritual" once per turn.
1916575.name: Storm Dragon Ritual

1916581.effect: If all monsters you control are Ritual Monsters (min.1), you can activate this card from your hand. The first time each Level 4 "Paladin" Ritual Monster you control would be destroyed by battle or card effect each turn, it is not destroyed. Once per turn, during the Battle Phase: You can target 2 Level 4 "Paladin" Ritual Monsters you control; change the first target to Defense Position, and if you do, until the end of this turn, the second target gains ATK equal to the original ATK of the first target.
1916581.name: Dragon Paladin Bonds

1916586.effect:
When a monster effect is activated while you control a Level 4 "Paladin" Ritual Monster: you can negate that effect, and if you do, apply 1 of the following effects based on the name of a Ritual Monster(s) you control.
●Paladin of White Dragon: All monsters you control gain 500 ATK until the End Phase
●Paladin of Dark Dragon: Add 1 Level 4 "Paladin" Ritual Monster from your GY to your hand
●Paladin of Photon Dragon: Destroy the negated card
●Paladin of Storm Dragon: Draw 1 card
●Paladin of Heterochromatic Dragon: Add 1 Ritual Spell or "Dragon Paladin" Spell/Trap from your GY to your hand.
1916586.name: Dragon Paladin Strike

6289.effect: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Luminous Dragon Ritual". You can Tribute this card; Special Summon 1 "Galaxy-Eyes Photon Dragon" from your hand or Deck. When this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard: Draw 1 card.
6289.name: Paladin of Photon Dragon

9310.effect: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Cynet Ritual". At the start of the Damage Step, if this card attacks a monster: You can return that monster to the hand. You can Tribute this card; Special Summon 1 Level 5 or higher Cyberse monster from your hand or Deck, but it cannot activate its effects this turn. You can only use each effect of "Paladin of Storm Dragon" once per turn.
9310.name: Paladin of Storm Dragon

3250.effect: You can Ritual Summon this card with "White Dragon Ritual". At the start of the Damage Step, if this card attacks a face-down Defense Position monster: Destroy that face-down monster. You can Tribute this card; Special Summon 1 "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" from your hand or Deck, but "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" cannot attack for the rest of this turn.
3250.name: Paladin of White Dragon

7379.effect: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Dark Dragon Ritual". At the start of the Damage Step, if this card attacks a Defense Position monster: Destroy that monster. You can Tribute this card; Special Summon 1 "Red-Eyes" monster from your hand or Deck. You can only use this effect of "Paladin of Dark Dragon" once per turn.
7379.name: Paladin of Dark Dragon

11305.effect: This card is used to Ritual Summon "Knight of Armor Dragon". You must also Tribute monsters from your hand or field whose total Levels equal 4 or more. During your Main Phase, except the turn this card was sent to the GY: You can banish monsters from your hand or face-up field whose total Levels equal 4 or more; banish this card from your GY, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Knight of Armor Dragon" from your GY. You can only use this effect of "Armor Dragon Ritual" once per turn.
11305.name: Armor Dragon Ritual

7380.effect: This card is used to Ritual Summon "Paladin of Dark Dragon". You must also Tribute monsters from your hand or field whose total Levels equal 4 or more. During your Main Phase, except the turn this card was sent to the GY: You can banish this card from your GY; add 1 "Red-Eyes" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand.
7380.name: Dark Dragon Ritual

6270.effect: This card is used to Ritual Summon "Paladin of Photon Dragon". You must also Tribute monsters from your hand or field whose total Levels equal exactly 4. You can banish this card from your Graveyard; banish monsters from your Graveyard whose total Levels equal exactly 4, and Special Summon 1 "Paladin of Photon Dragon" from your hand after that. (This Special Summon is treated as a Ritual Summon.)
6270.name: Luminous Dragon Ritual

4744.effect: This card is used to Ritual Summon "Paladin of White Dragon". You must also Tribute monsters from your hand or field whose total Levels equal 4 or more.
4744.name: White Dragon Ritual

1897237.effect: For this card's Tribute Summon, you can Tribute any number of monsters (min. 1). This card's ATK/DEF becomes the combined original ATK/DEF of the monsters Tributed for its Summon. If this card is Tribute Summoned: You can target cards on the field and/or in the GY, up to the number of monsters Tributed for this cards Summon; return them to the hand. If this card is sent to the GY: You can add 1 "Garzett" card from your GY to your hand, except "Cosmic Maju Garzett", or place 1 "Garzett" Link Monster from your GY in your Spell & Trap Zone as a face-up Continuous Spell. You can only use each effect of "Cosmic Maju Garzett" once per turn.
1897237.name: Cosmic Maju Garzett

1897240.effect: This card cannot attack. This effect cannot be negated. During your Main Phase: You can activate this effect; you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except DARK Fiend monsters, also, add 1 Level 5 or higher "Garzett" monster from your Deck to your hand, and if you do, you can Tribute Summon 1 "Garzett" monster during your Main Phase this turn, in addition to your Normal Summon/Set. (You can only gain this effect once per turn). If this card is Tributed for the Tribute Summon or Special Summon of a "Garzett" monster: You can place 2 Maju Counters on each "Garzett" Continuous Spell you control, or place 1 Link-2 "Garzett" monster from your Extra Deck in your Spell & Trap Zone as a face-up Continuous Spell. You can only use each effect of "Garzett Soothsayer" once per turn.
1897240.name: Garzett Soothsayer

1897241.effect: This card cannot attack. This effect cannot be negated. If you control no monsters: You can Special Summon this card from your hand, and if you do, add 1 Level 5 or higher "Garzett" monster from your Deck to your hand, also you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except DARK Fiend monsters. If this card is Tributed for the Tribute Summon or Special Summon of a "Garzett" monster: You can place 1 Maju Counter on each "Garzett" Contiuous Spell you control, or place 1 Link-1 "Garzett" monster from your Extra Deck in your Spell & Trap Zone as a face-up Continuous Spell. You can only use each effect of "Garzett Acolyte" once per turn.
1897241.name: Garzett Acolyte

1897231.effect: For this card's Tribute Summon, you can Tribute any number of monsters (min. 1). This card's ATK/DEF becomes the combined original ATK/DEF of the monsters Tributed for its Summon. When your opponent activates a card or effect (Quick Effect): You can banish 2 cards from your GY face-down; negate the activation. You cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck the Duel you activate this effect, except "Garzett" Link Monsters. You can use this effect a number of times per turn up to half the number of monsters Tributed for this card's Summon. If this card is sent to the GY: You can shuffle up to 3 "Garzett" cards with different names from your GY into your Deck; place 1 "Garzett" Link Monster from your Extra Deck in your Spell & Trap Zone as a face-up Continuous Spell with a Link Rating equal to the number of cards shuffled. You can only use this effect of "Nightmare Maju Garzett" once per turn.
1897231.name: Nightmare Maju Garzett

1897228.effect:
Once per turn, during the Standby Phase: You can place 1 Maju Counter on each Continuous Spell you control for each "Garzett" Link Monster Card in your Spell & Trap Zone that is treated as a face-up Continuous Spell. When a Level 5 or higher "Garzett" monster is Tribute Summoned or destroys a monster by battle: You can have that monster gain the appropriate effects until the end of the next turn based on the number of "Garzett" Link Monster Cards in your Spell & Trap Zone that point to it.
● 1+: Gains 1000 ATK/DEF.
● 2+: If card battles, your opponent cannot activate cards or effects until the end of the Damage Step
● 3: Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can discard 1 card, then target 1 card on the field; destroy it.
1897228.name: Maju Garzett Dreamscape

9855.effect: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by Tributing 3 monsters. This card's ATK becomes the combined original ATK of the Tributed monsters. Your opponent cannot activate cards or effects during the Battle Phase.
9855.name: Emperor Maju Garzett

2013.effect: The ATK of this card becomes twice the original ATK of 1 monster that you Tributed for the Tribute Summon of this card.
2013.name: Great Maju Garzett

7024.effect: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by Tributing all monsters you control. This card's ATK becomes the combined original ATK of the Tributed monsters. If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage.
7024.name: Legendary Maju Garzett

2728.effect: The ATK of this card becomes equal to the combined original ATK of the 2 monsters you Tributed for the Tribute Summon of this card.
2728.name: Maju Garzett

1897251.effect:
2 Effect Monsters, including a Level 5 or higher "Garzett" monster 
For this card's Link Summon, you can also use 1 "Garzett" Link Monster Card in your Spell & Trap Zone as material. If this card is Special Summoned: Place it in your Spell & Trap Zone as a face-up Continuous Spell. While this card is treated as a Continuous Spell, this card gains the original effects of Link-1 "Garzett" Monster Cards that are treated as Continuous Spells that are not in your adjacent Spell & Trap Zones. Once per turn, during the Standby Phase, if this card is treated as a Continuous Spell: You can place 1 Maju Counter on this card for each monster it points to. You can only Special Summon "Captain Maju Garzett" once per turn.
1897251.name: Captain Maju Garzett

1897254.effect:
2 Effect Monsters, including a Level 5 or higher "Garzett" monster 
For this card's Link Summon, you can also use 1 "Garzett" Link Monster Card in your Spell & Trap Zone as material. If this card is Special Summoned: Place this card in your Spell & Trap Zone as a face-up Continuous Spell. While this card is treated as a Continuous Spell, this card gains the original effects of Link-1 "Garzett" Monster Cards that are treated as Continuous Spells in your adjacent Spell & Trap Zones. Once per turn, during the End Phase, if this card is treated as a Continuous Spell: You can place 1 Maju Counter on this card for each monster it points to. You can only Special Summon "Duke Maju Garzett" once per turn.
1897254.name: Duke Maju Garzett

1897260.effect:
1 Level 5 or higher "Garzett" monster
If this card is Link Summoned: Place this card in your Spell & Trap Zone as a face-up Continuous Spell and if you do, place Maju Counters on this card equal to the Level of the monster used as material for this card's Link Summon. While this card is treated as a Continuous Spell, if it would be destroyed by card effect, you can remove 2 Maju Counters from this card instead. While this card is treated as a Continuous Spell, a monster in a Main Monster Zone this card points to gains 500 ATK for each Maju Counter on this card. If this card is sent from your Spell & Trap Zone to the GY: You can add 1 "Garzett" card from your GY to your hand. You can only Special Summon "Enraged Maju Garzett" once per turn.
1897260.name: Enraged Maju Garzett

1897247.effect:
2+ Effect Monsters, including a Level 5 or higher "Garzett" monster 
For this card's Link Summon, you can also use 1 "Garzett" Link Monster Card in your Spell & Trap Zone as material. You cannot Summon/Set monsters to a zone this card in your Main Monster Zone points to. (Quick Effect): You can place this card in your Spell & Trap Zone as a face-up Continuous Spell. While this card is treated as a Continuous Spell, this card gains the original effects of Link-2 "Garzett" Monster Cards you control that are treated as Continuous Spells. If this card is sent from your Spell & Trap Zone to the GY: You can add 1 "Garzett" monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only Special Summon "Maju Garzett - True Horror" once per turn.
1897247.name: Maju Garzett - True Horror

1897256.effect:
1 Level 5 or higher "Garzett" monster 
If this card is Link Summoned: Place this card in your Spell & Trap Zone as a face-up Continuous Spell and if you do, place Maju Counters on this card equal to the Level of the monster used as material for this card's Link Summon. If a monster(s) in a Main Monster Zone(s) that a "Garzett" Link Monster Card that is treated as a Continuous Spell points to, would be destroyed by card effect, you can remove 2 Maju Counters from this card instead. While this card is treated as a Continuous Spell, a monster in a Main Monster Zone this card points to gains 500 DEF for each Maju Counter on this card. If this card is sent from your Spell & Trap Zone to the GY: You can add 1 "Garzett" card from your GY to your hand. You can only Special Summon "Passive Maju Garzett" once per turn.
1897256.name: Passive Maju Garzett

1903214.effect:
Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned by the effect of "Yubel". This card's name is also treated as "Yubel - Terror Incarnate" while in the hand, field, or GY. You can only use 1 of the following effects of "Yubel - Harbinger of Disaster" per turn, and only once that turn.
● (Quick Effect): You can target 1 other card you control; destroy 1 card in a different column than the target, then, destroy the target, also if it was a monster, this card gains ATK/DEF equal to half the ATK/DEF of that monster while on the field.
● If this card leaves the field by a card effect: You can Special Summon 1 "Yubel - The Final End" or "Yubel - The Ultimate Nightmare" from your hand, Deck, or GY.
1903214.name: Yubel - Harbinger of Disaster

1903217.effect:
Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned by the effect of "Yubel". This card's name is also treated as "Yubel - Terror Incarnate" while in the hand, field, or GY. You can only use 1 of the following effects of "Yubel - Infernal Remnant" per turn, and only once that turn.
● (Quick Effect): You can target 1 other card you control; negate the effects of all other cards in that card's column, then, destroy the target, also if it was a monster, this card gains ATK/DEF equal to half the ATK/DEF of that monster while on the field.
● If this card leaves the field by a card effect: You can Special Summon 1 "Yubel - The Tortuous Symbiote" or "Yubel - The Ultimate Nightmare" from your hand, Deck, or GY.
1903217.name: Yubel - Infernal Remnant

1903207.effect: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned by the effect of "Yubel - Harbinger of Disaster". Your opponent cannot target Level 11 or higher monsters on the field with cards effects. Once per turn, if a monster(s) is sent to the GY: You can target 1 monster on the field or in the GY; this card gains ATK/DEF equal to half the targets ATK/DEF. If this card leaves the field by battle or card effect: You can Special Summon 1 "Yubel " or "Yubel - Terror Incarnate" from your hand or GY. You can only use this effect of "Yubel - The Final End" once per turn.
1903207.name: Yubel - The Final End

1903210.effect: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned by the effect of "Yubel - Infernal Remnant". Level 11 or higher monsters on the field cannot be destroyed by your opponent's cards effects. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can add 1 "Yubel" card from your Deck to your hand, also if it was a monster, this card gains ATK/DEF equal to its Level x200. If this card leaves the field by battle or card effect: You can Special Summon 1 "Yubel " or "Yubel - Terror Incarnate" from your hand or GY. You can only use this effect of "Yubel - The Torturous Symbiote" once per turn.
1903210.name: Yubel - The Torturous Symbiote

1903193.effect: When a Spell/Trap Card, or monster effect, is activated, and you control a "Yubel" monster: Negate the activation, and if you do, shuffle that card into the Deck, then destroy 1 "Yubel" monster you control. You can only activate 1 "Yubel Consciousness Harvester" per turn.
1903193.name: Yubel Consciousness Harvester

1903196.effect:
Once per turn, if a card(s) you control would be destroyed by battle or your opponent's card effect, while you control only Fiend monsters, you can destroy 1 "Yubel" monster you control instead. You can only control 1 "Yubel Contagion". While you control a Fiend monster whose original ATK/DEF are 0, apply these effects during your opponent's turn, or if you control a Level 12 "Yubel" monster, apply them during both player's turn instead.
● All monsters your opponent controls are changed to Attack Position, also, all monsters your opponent controls must attack the monster(s) you control with the highest Level, if able.
● Fiend monster you control whose original ATK/DEF are 0 cannot be destroyed by battle.
● Your opponent takes any battle damage you would have taken.
1903196.name: Yubel Contagion

1903189.effect: Shuffle 1 "Yubel" monster from your hand, field, or GY into your Deck, then either add from your Deck to your hand or Special Summon from your hand ignoring its Summoning conditions, 1 "Yubel" monster that must be Special Summoned by the shuffled monster. During the End Phase: You can destroy 1 card you control. You can only use 1 effect of "Yubel's Continuation" per turn, and only once that turn.
1903189.name: Yubel's Continuation

1903206.effect:
If your opponent takes battle or effect damage: You can have 1 "Yubel" monster you control gain ATK/DEF equal to the damage they took. You can only use 1 of the following effects of "Yubel Projection" per turn, and only once that turn.
● Add 1 "Yubel" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Yubel Projection", then, destroy 1 other "Yubel" card from your hand or field. You cannot Special Summon monsters from your Extra Deck the turn you activate this effect.
● During the End Phase: You can Special Summon 1 "Yubel" from your hand or GY but its effects are negated this turn.
1903206.name: Yubel Projection

1903201.effect:
Activate 1 of these effects.
● Add 1 "Yubel" monster from your Deck to your hand.
● Shuffle any number of Level 10 or higher monsters from your hand into the Deck, then draw the same number of cards.
● Special Summon 1 Level 10 or higher monster from your your hand in Defense Positon.
You can only activate 1 "Yubel's Descent" per turn.
1903201.name: Yubel's Descent

1903194.effect: If you control a Level 11 or higher "Yubel" monster that was Special Summoned by the effect of a "Yubel" monster: Discard 1 card then target 1 card on the field; destroy it. If you control a Level 12 "Yubel" monster, you do not need to discard to activate this effect. You can only use this effect of "Yubel's Vendetta" once per turn.
1903194.name: Yubel's Vendetta

4885.effect: This card cannot be destroyed by battle. You take no Battle Damage from battles involving this card. Before damage calculation, when this face-up Attack Position card is attacked by an opponent's monster: Inflict damage to your opponent equal to that monster's ATK. During your End Phase: Tribute 1 other monster or destroy this card. When this card is destroyed, except by its own effect: Its owner can Special Summon 1 "Yubel - Terror Incarnate" from their hand, Deck, or Graveyard.
4885.name: Yubel

4886.effect: Cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. Must be Special Summoned by "Yubel", and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. This card cannot be destroyed by battle. You take no Battle Damage from battles involving this card. Before damage calculation, when this face-up Attack Position card is attacked by an opponent's monster: Inflict damage to your opponent equal to that monster's ATK. During your End Phase: Destroy all other monsters on the field. When this face-up card leaves the field: You can Special Summon 1 "Yubel - The Ultimate Nightmare" from your hand, Deck, or Graveyard.
4886.name: Yubel - Terror Incarnate

4887.effect: Cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. Must be Special Summoned by "Yubel - Terror Incarnate", and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. This card cannot be destroyed by battle. You take no Battle Damage from battles involving this card. At the end of the Damage Step, if this face-up Attack Position card battles an opponent's monster: Inflict damage equal to that monster's ATK to your opponent, also destroy that monster.
4887.name: Yubel - The Ultimate Nightmare

3131.effect: Cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by sending 1 face-up "Elemental HERO Neos" and 1 face-up "Yubel" you control to the Graveyard, and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. This card cannot be destroyed by card effects. At the end of the Damage Step, if this card battled an opponent's monster: Inflict damage to your opponent equal to the ATK of the monster it battled, and you gain Life Points equal to that monster's DEF.
3131.name: Neos Wiseman

10525.effect:
"Elemental HERO Neos" + "Yubel"
Must be Fusion Summoned. Before damage calculation, if this card battles an opponent's monster: You can inflict damage to your opponent equal to that opponent's monster's ATK. If this face-up card is destroyed by battle, or leaves the field because of an opponent's card effect while its owner controls it: You can Special Summon 1 "Neos Wiseman" from your hand or Deck, ignoring its Summoning conditions. You can only use this effect of "Elemental HERO Neos Kluger" once per turn.
10525.name: Elemental HERO Neos Kluger

1894760.effect: When this card is activated: You can add 1 "Codebreaker Zero Day" from your Deck to your hand. You can discard 1 card; Special Summon 1 "Codebreak Token" (DARK/Level 1 (?)/Cyberse/ATK 0/DEF 0), also, for the rest of this turn, you cannot Special Summon monsters, except DARK Link Monsters. If this card is sent to the GY: You can target up to 3 "Codebreak" cards in your GY with different names; shuffle them into the Deck. You can only use each effect of "Codebreak Bind" once per turn.
1894760.name: Codebreak Bind

1894805.effect: All "Codebreaker" monsters on the field gain 500 ATK. Monsters on the field cannot be destroyed by battle by "Codebreaker" monsters, also all battle damage taken from battles involving "Codebreaker" monsters is doubled. You can banish 1 card from your GY; add 1 "Codebreaker" card from your Deck to your hand, but you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except DARK Link Monsters. You can only use this effect of "Codebreak Backfire" once per turn. "Codebreaker" monsters your opponent controls cannot declare an attack nor be Tributed for a Tribute Summon, also they cannot be used as Xyz, Synchro, Fusion or Link Material.
1894805.name: Codebreak Backfire

10562.effect: All Link Monsters pointing to this card lose 1000 ATK, except "Codebreaker" Link Monsters. If a "Codebreaker" Link Monster(s) on the field is destroyed by battle or card effect, while this card is on the field: Destroy this card. If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can add 1 "Codebreaker Zero Day" from your Deck to your hand.
10562.name: Codebreaker Zero Day

10612.effect:
2 Effect Monsters
When this card is Special Summoned, if it is co-linked: You can Special Summon 1 "Codebreaker Zero Day" from your hand, Deck, or GY, to any zone a Link Monster points to. During the End Phase, if this card is in the GY because it was destroyed, while in your possession, by an opponent's card and sent there this turn: You can Special Summon this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "Codebreaker Virus Swordsman" once per turn.
10612.name: Codebreaker Virus Swordsman

10611.effect:
2+ monsters, including a "Codebreaker" monster

534360.effect: These hidden troops of the Draconia Empire wield spears tipped with poison. They ambush any intruders from foreign lands, and serve to make Draconia a dangerous place for any who would bring it harm.
534360.name: Cave Dragoons of Draconia
534360.pendulum_effect: Once per turn, if you Normal or Special Summon a Normal Monster(s): Add 1 "Draconia" card from your Deck to your hand.

534361.effect: The most evil of the Dragoons of Draconia, these troops will not hesitate to use underhanded tactics. Though even the other Dragoons fear them, they are just trying their best to defend their homeland in their own way.
534361.name: Dark Dragoons of Draconia
534361.pendulum_effect: If a Normal Monster you control declares an attack: Negate the effects of all cards your opponent controls until the end of the Damage Step, also your opponent cannot activate cards or effects until the end of the Damage Step.

534374.effect: These armed troops, on their gigantic beasts, are the strongest of the Dragoons of Draconia. Opposing armies fear these crack troops, and to see one is to know defeat.
534374.name: Grand Dragoons of Draconia
534374.pendulum_effect: If a Normal Monster you control battles, during damage calculation: You can have that monster's ATK/DEF become equal to the ATK or DEF (whichever is higher) of the opponent's battling monster +100, during damage calculation only. You can only use this effect of "Grand Dragoons of Draconia" once per turn.

534394.effect: You cannot Summon monsters, except Normal Monsters, during the turn you use this card's effects, or while this card is on the field. If a "Draconia" monster(s) would be sent from the field to the Extra Deck, you can add those monsters to your hand instead. Once per turn: You can destroy 1 card on your side of the field, then add 1 "Draconia" monster from your Deck to your hand.
534394.name: The Draconia Empire

2031615.effect: If you control 2 "Draconia" cards in your Pendulum Zones, your opponent can only activate 1 monster effect per turn. You can target 1 card in your Pendulum Zone; destroy it, and if you do, you can place 1 "Draconia" Pendulum Monster from your Deck to your Pendulum Zone. You can only use this effect of "Draconian Spirit" once per turn.

1288029.effect: All "Draconia" monsters you control gain 500 ATK/DEF. You can target 1 face-up card on the field; destroy 1 "Draconia" monster you control, and if you do, negate that target's effects, and if you do that, destroy it. You can only use this effect of "The Forces of Draconia" once per turn.
1288029.name: The Forces of Draconia

7241.effect: Silently creeping in from the deep sea, elite black ops marine troops of the Draconia Empire wage an endless battle against the hated Principality of Dinon on the sea's opposite shores.
7241.name: Sea Dragoons of Draconia
7241.pendulum_effect: When a monster is destroyed by battle: You can Special Summon 1 Normal Monster from your hand. You can only use this effect of "Sea Dragoons of Draconia" once per turn.

7096.effect: Armed with muskets and iron spears, these mounted land troops of the Draconia Empire are feared by the Reptier Kingdom and other bordering nations.
7096.name: Dragoons of Draconia
7096.pendulum_effect: Once per turn, if a Normal Monster you control destroys an opponent's monster by battle, after damage calculation: You can add 1 Level 4 or higher Normal Monster from your Deck to your hand.

7430.effect: Rumored as being formed to invade the neutral, floating Sky-State of Cxulub, these mounted air troops of the Draconia Empire have prompted bordering nations to strengthen their security.
7430.name: Sky Dragoons of Draconia
7430.pendulum_effect: Once per turn, when a Normal Monster you control inflicts battle damage to your opponent: You can target 1 card on the field; destroy it.

1016009.effect: You can discard this card; send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the GY, and if you do, you can add 1 "Lightray" card that is banished or in your GY to your hand, except "Lightray Parshath". If you Special Summon a "Lightray" monster: You can Special Summon this card from your GY, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can target 1 "Lightray" monster that is banished or in your GY; replace this effect with that monster's original effects. You can only use each effect of "Lightray Parshath" once per turn.

1565427.effect:

A sea-dweller that continues to resist the Atlantean Army. Though it is still driven by vengeance, it has found comrades in the form of good-natured travelers from Draconia, gaining new reasons to fight and pursue peace.

8496.effect: A ferocious serpent that was being hunted by Atlanteans. Battle-weary and ragged, it came upon an ancient light, and gained new strength for its battle. With its increased power, it launched an invasion of enemy territory with a renewed assault.

1997236.effect: This apprentice is seeking out the mysterious power that enables the Summoners to become empowered. Legend has it that once the Empowered Warriors unlock their true potential, their power will give everyone the ability to empower themselves.

1997234.effect: The Empowered Warriors are a mysterious people. By themselves, the Summoners don't seem like much, but it is said that they have a hidden power within them that will eliminate all of the world's problems. This disciple aims to unlock that power.

1997234.pendulum_effect: During your Main Phase: You can add 1 "Empowered Warrior" or "Aether" monster from your face-up Extra Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Disciple of the Empowered Warriors" once per turn.

1997162.effect:
Once per turn: You can target 1 non-LIGHT or non-DARK "Empowered Warrior" monster you control; Special Summon 1 Spellcaster "Summoner" monster from your hand, Deck, or GY with the same Attribute as that monster in face-up Attack Position or face-down Defense Position, then you can apply 1 of the following effects based on the Attribute of that monster.
● EARTH: Destroy cards your opponent controls up to the number of Normal Monsters you control.
● WATER: Flip that targeted monster face-down, then flip another face-down monster you control face-up.
● FIRE: This turn, monsters your opponent control must attack FIRE monsters you control (if able), also, after damage calculation, if a monster your opponent controls battles a FIRE monster you control, destroy that opponent's monster.
● WIND: Send 1 monster you control to the GY, then send 1 monster your opponent controls whose ATK is equal to or lower than the ATK that sent monster you controlled had on the field to the GY.

● LIGHT: Target 1 monster you control; it gains 1000 ATK/DEF.
● DARK: Target 1 monster you control; this turn, it cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects.
● EARTH: Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; negate its effects until the end of the turn.
● WATER: Target 1 face-up Spell/Trap your opponent controls; negate its effects until the end of the turn.
● FIRE: Target 1 monster your opponent controls; destroy it.
● WIND: Target 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls; destroy it.
